thread.title: 'The Voice': Third Night of Battles Sees Three Judges Use Final Steals
thread.title_full: 'The Voice': Third Night of Battles Sees Three Judges Use Final Steals

title: 'The Voice': Third Night of Battles Sees Three Judges Use Final Steals
text:
'The Voice': Third Night of Battles S... 'The Voice': Third Night of Battles Sees Three Judges Use Final Steals Next Story Prev Story 10 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The third night of battles on The Voice brought a wide range of performances to the ring, as everyone fought to stay in the competition. Selena Gomez , Missy Elliott , John Fogerty and Brad Paisley all returned to give advice to the artists from Gwen Stefani , Pharrell , Adam Levine and Blake Shelton 's season-nine teams.   Hollywood Reporter.
